synopsis.text: Lyrical Lily, a popular DJ unit, learns that they have been selected to perform at their town's year-long revitalization event. Excited but anxious about keeping the event dynamic, they decide to invite guest DJ units to join them on stage over the course of the year. With a fresh roster of talent and a new stage, Lyrical Lily gears up to shine brighter than ever.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
